snippet.title: The Light will lead you HOME (survival horror game) - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as Brian, a teenage boy living with his parents. You wake up to find yourself trapped in your house with a horrible monster that only has one weakness: light. Can you get out?

A survival horror story-driven game.

OUT NOW - Download here:
Itch.io: https://lilithschild.itch.io/the-light-will-lead-you-home
VoxPop Games: https://www.voxpopgames.site/store/389
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/.../the-light-will-lead-you-home/640130

Checkout out more from Lilith's Child Games Studio:
https://linktr.ee/lilithschildgames

Follow us on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lilithschild_gs
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/liliths_child_games/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lilithschildgames

Royalty free music used from:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R2lGIWdSr0o&ab_channel=DynamixRecordings

#TheLightWillLeadYouHOME #gaming #HorrorGame #SurvivalHorror
